page.content: The area in question consists mainly of rough pastures and marshland.There are only a very small number of people living here and these are mainly the older generation as this area,like many others,is suffering from rural depopulation. There are just not enough jobs for the up and coming generation. This area is as you would imagine a typical Highland village to be like.The small houses are situated near the river as this is where the best land is.There is little or no recreational facilities except what nature has provided. The main road runs close by and this links this community with the rest of the island of SKYE.
